long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use PDF converter. Extension Convert PDF to Word gives you the opportunity to easy convert any of your PDF files. Extension Convert PDF to Word provides you with a search bar in new tab.

•PDF extension supports PDF conversion to DOC and DOCX
•Finish everything in your Browser 
•Unlimited number of conversions
•Provides you with a search bar in new tab 

By clicking 'ADD TO CHROME', you accept and agree to install the Convert PDF to DOC-DOCX Chrome extension, set the New Tab to Convert PDF to DOC-DOCX powered by bing, and adhere to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

How to use this extension:

-Open the new tab in your Chrome Browser
-Below the search bar you will see call to action button to Choose PDF file you would like to convert,
-Chose format in which you would  like to convert, there are two options: DOC and DOCX
-Click start converting green button
-Converted file will be downloaded and you will see it in left bottom corner of the browser or in your downloaded list files

If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us via email: freepdfconversion@gmail.com
